subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The chief operating officer of the Force India team in Formula One, the American Otmar Szafnauer, 48, has loved auto racing since his first go-kart ride as a child.
snippet: The chief operating officer of the Force India team in Formula One, the American Otmar Szafnauer, 48, has loved auto racing since his first go-kart ride as a child.
